Articles.Content: My Panzers what I made destroy sience and Helix! My whatever-is-left-of-a-nuked-and-blown-up-and-invaded-thing-that-was-a-hill-once-about-a-decade-ago.
I use a quantum drive to teleport the hill to my house my house hill
I colonize the hill. My hill.
I become a patriot and become the united hill of merica, my hill country.
Summon kraken and take hill to the Marianis trench my hill

I hide the hill inside of a mall.

My hill.

I make a hill over a mall

Mah hill!

I destroy all living organisms and all buildings I take the hill and push of all how try to take it

MY HILL

I poisoned Ethanadams' food supply with rattlesnake venom. 

Nobody's hill.
I put a flag on it. my hill

I land with a nuclear lightbulb lander ON your flag.

My hill now.
your lander overheats and explodes. I put up a forcefeild. my hill

I knock out your shield generator with AT-ATs and assault your hill with star destroyers/ stormtroopers.

 The Emperor's hill.
i call in luke skywalker to kill the emporer. luke skywalkers hill reinforced by juggernuats and snowspeeders.

Jar Jar Binks gets his tongue stuck in the generator, rendering you defenseless. 

 I beat up George Lucas and throw you off the hill.

My hill.
I destroy every thing in existence nobody's nothing

Chuck Norris decides he won't let you.

 Chuck Norris' hill.

I hire jakie chan and he beats chuck norris. my hill.

unrelated, you are supposed to take the hill for yourself, not for chuck norris or for nobody.

> 
> I hire jakie chan and he beats chuck norris. my hill.
> **unrelated, you are supposed to take the hill for yourself, not for chuck norris or for nobody.**

Not true.

 I correct you and take the hill. My hill. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I detonate 200000000000000 tsar Bombas over the solor system they bombs destroy everything into a glowing radioactive cloud that will kill you if you get within 200 miles 

my hill

I destroy the universe. Since I am a god with immeasurable powers, I recreate the universe, including the stock KSP system (Plus all planet mods) and make a base on Erfen, guarded by thousands of sentries. If you attack, I will unleash bombs that can destroy entire galactic superclusters, including the Hercules-Corona Borealis Great Wall (Which stretches for 10 billion lightyears)

My base on Erfen.

The Vogon Constructor Fleet obliterates your planet to make way for an intergalactic highway.

Some of the rubble lands on a nearby planet. I plant a flag and call it a hill. My hill.
I construct my hill. Basics in mind, but equipped with a sonic-powered defense perimeter. If you enter 2 gridmarks within the perimeter, you will be destroyed instantly.
I send spec op commandos my hill

i use an Anti Bio Beam to decimate every living thing on the hill. i hit the sonic generator with an ion cannon, disabling it. i then claim the hill

my sterile hill
